fields.description:
I'd love to see the ability to have conditional logic around themes, for TSS, and XML files allowing for something like this:

"Window[theme=zyx]" : {
    backgroundColor : '#FF0000'
}
"Window[theme=xyz]" : {
    backgroundColor : '#FFFFFF'
}

and in XML:

<Alloy>
    <Window>
        <View theme="xyz" />
        <View theme="zyx" />
    </Window>
</Alloy>
fields.summary: Consider adding conditional for theme support in Alloy
